summary: When doctors diagnosed 19-year-old rock star Jason Becker with Lou Gehrig's Disease, they said he would never make music again. 22 years later, without the ability to move or to speak, Jason is alive and making music with his eyes.
cast: Jason Becker|Dan Alvarez|Ehren Becker|Gary Becker|Pat Becker|Ron Becker|Mike Bemesderfer|Gregg Bissonette|Matt Blackett|Nate Fox|Marty Friedman|Steve Hunter|Richie Kotzen|Dave Lopez|Jimmy O'Shea|Jim Ocean|Serrana Pilar|Joe Satriani|Michael P. Shannon|Kenny Stavropoulos|Miko Thatcher|Steve Vai|Mike Varney|Marilyn White
title: Jason Becker: Not Dead Yet
